request:
resolve ID Keys panel click navigation type errors

## Problem Fixed
- Clicking on ID Keys panel entries wasn't triggering blue border highlighting
- TypeScript errors: goToDiff expected IdBasedPath but received string
- Navigation to JSON nodes from ID Keys panel was broken

## Root Cause
- goToDiff() function expects IdBasedPath branded type (line 32 in JsonViewerSyncContext interface)
- handlePathClick() and handleOccurrenceClick() were passing raw string paths
- Missing type conversion using validateAndCreateIdBasedPath()

## Solution
- Fixed both click handlers to properly convert numeric paths to IdBasedPath
- handlePathClick(): Convert numericPath using validateAndCreateIdBasedPath()
- handleOccurrenceClick(): Convert numericPath using validateAndCreateIdBasedPath()
- Removed unused import warning for validateAndCreateIdBasedPath

## Expected Behavior (Fixed)
âœ… Clicking ID Keys panel entry #1 â†’ navigates to array location
âœ… Blue border highlighting appears on target nodes in both panels
âœ… Persistent highlighting maintained until next navigation
âœ… TypeScript compilation success with strict type safety
